SA20n1331:1: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati |
SA20n1331:2: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyunuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā'sammoṣadharmatā vāsanā-samuddhātaḥ sarvākāra-varajñānañca |
SA20n1331:6: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe |
SA20n1331:19: ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam |
SA20n1331:22: ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate |
SA20n1331:35: prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam |
SA20n1331:43: ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā |
SA20n1331:61: dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti |
SA20n1331:63: ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati |
SA20n1331:75: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti |
SA20n1331:76: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti |
SA20n1331:77: ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:80: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya |
SA20n1331:81: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati |
SA20n1331:89: vicitrakarmābhisaṃskāraphalāni tvetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni bhagavatā [arthi-] vineyavaśena nirdeśitāni |
SA20n1331:92: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya mahataḥ phalānuśaṃsasya spṛhyamānarūpāratasmācca pāpādvirameyuḥ |
SA20n1331:96: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:97: paravihiṃsāmadattādānañca prahāya gurūṇāṃ cābhivādanavandana-pratyutthānāñjali-sāmīcī-karma kṛtvā pareṣāṃ manastuṣṭipriyabhogāhrasvīkaraṇān nihatamānatvācca dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:98: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:99: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:101: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:102: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:104: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:105: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:106: kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ saṃvṛtātmā pratigraha-bhojane ca mātrajñaḥ glāneṣu bhaiṣajyapradaḥ viṣame karmaṇi pratigraha-paribhogavaiṣamye cāpravṛttatvāt [dhātuvaiṣamyānu] lomanācca nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatvaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:107: yenaiva ca karmaṇā utsaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate tenaivordhvaṅgaromatām |
SA20n1331:108: svayaṃ kuśalamīmāṃsakaḥ paṇḍitavijña-sevī sūkṣmārthacintakaḥ gurūṇāṃ sthānaśodhakaḥ utsādakaḥ snāpakaśca ekavihāritvādekamitra-saṃśrayatvātsūkṣmārthapraveśāt tṛṇaparṇādyāvilāpakarṣaṇādāgantukamalāpakarṣaṇācca ekaikaromatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:110: yenaiva ca karmaṇā ekaikaromatoktā tenaiva sūkṣmaślakṣṇatvacatā veditavyā |
SA20n1331:111: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:114: ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt |
SA20n1331:115: anenaiva ca karmaṇā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā citāntarāṃśatā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1331:116: yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:117: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:118: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:119: arthimyaḥ sattvebhyo yathābhipretaṃ dhanaṃ samyagvisṛjya siṃhahanutāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:120: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca |
SA20n1331:121: pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva samādāpayitvā karuṇācittatāmupādāya mahatī dharmasamādāne pratipannatvāduṣṇīṣaśiraskatāñca prabhūta-tanujihvatāṃ ca pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:122: satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:123: kṛtsnaṃ jaganmaitreṇa cetasā'nukampya mātṛvatpitṛvadabhinīlanetratāṃ gopakṣmanetratāñca pratilabhate |
SA20n1331:124: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām |
SA20n1331:125: sarveṣu ca dvātriṃśatsu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvaviśeṣeṇa śīlaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratilambhāya veditavyam |
SA20n1331:127: na hi śīlavipanno bodhisattvo manuṣyatvameva tāvadāsādayet kutaḥ punarmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam |
SA20n1331:128: tatroṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anava lokitamūrdhatā caikaṃ mahāpuruṣakṣaṇaṃ veditavye tadvyatirekeṇānupalambhāt |
SA20n1331:132: nipuṇakāritayā cakracaraṇatā ucchaṅgacaraṇatā jālapāṇipādatā sūkṣmatvacatā citāntarāṃśatā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā vṛhadṛjugātratā prabhūtatanujihvatā ca nirvartate |
SA20n1331:133: nityakāritayā dīrghāṅga litvaṃ āyatapādapārṣṇitā anavanatakāyatā nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā aviraladantatā ca nirvartate |
SA20n1331:137: prāmodyaprītiprabhāsvareṇa cittena kuśalasamācārād vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā nirvartate |
SA20n1331:139: bodhāya kuśalamūlapariṇamanādūrdhvāṅga-romatā catvāriṃśatsamadantatā rasarasāgratā uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā ca nirvartate |
SA20n1331:140: kuśale atṛptālīnaprayogāt siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā siṃhahanutā ca nirvartaṃte |
SA20n1331:141: sattveṣu hitacittatayā samadarśanāt samadantatā abhinīlanetratā gopakṣmamā ca nirvartate |
SA20n1331:143: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati |
SA20n1331:147: tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1331:148: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni |
SA20n1331:150: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate |
SA20n1331:154: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate |
SA20n1331:157: yāvānūrṇā-praviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate |
SA20n1331:159: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate |
SA20n1331:160: yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati |
SA20n1331:163: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā |
SA20n1331:166: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam |
